select ar1_0.assistance_request_id,ar1_0.athlete_athlete_id,ar1_0.coach_coach_id,ar1_0.remarks,ar1_0.status from assistance_request ar1_0 where ar1_0.coach_coach_id=? and ar1_0.status=?
select c1_0.coach_id,c1_0.birth_date,c1_0.category,c1_0.create_date,c1_0.first_name,c1_0.gender,c1_0.last_name,c1_0.photo_url,c1_0.user_id from coach c1_0 where c1_0.user_id=?
